newsitem.title: BULGARIA: BULGARIA TO PAY 28 MLN LEVS FOR C.BANK'S AUDIT.
newsitem.headline: BULGARIA TO PAY 28 MLN LEVS FOR C.BANK'S AUDIT.

text.p: Bulgaria is to pay 28 million levs ($130,000) to international auditors Deloitte & Touche for performing the audit of the Bulgarian National Bank (BNB), a central bank official said.

"Deloitte & Touche was the most acceptable bidder because of its rich experience in auditing central banks and of the competitive price of 28 million levs it offered," said a BNB offical, who declined to be named.

The BNB's plenary council chose Deloitte & Touche through a tender among five auditing firms last month to carry out an international audit of the central bank expected to be completed by the end of October.

An annual international audit of the BNB was among the funding requirements of the International Monetary Fund, which sealed a $580 million stand-by loan agreement with Bulgaria in July. -- Sofia Newsroom, (++359-2) 84561
